Translations.Text: Atahpara ami tamke eka bistirna-bijana prantare niksepa karalama, takhana tini chilena rugna.
Ami tamra upara eka latabisista brksa udagata karalama.
Ebam tamke, laksa ba tatodhika lokera prati prerana karalama.
Tara bisbasa sthapana karala atahpara ami taderake nirdharita samaya paryanta jibanopabhoga karate dilama.
Ebara taderake jijnesa karuna, tomara palanakartara jan'ye ki kan'ya santana rayeche ebam tadera jan'ye ki putra-santana.
Na ki ami tadera upasthitite pheresataganake narirupe srsti karechi
jeno, tara managara ukti kare ye
allaha santana janma diyechena. Niscaya tara mithyabadi.
Tini ki putra-santanera sthale kan'ya-santana pachanda karechena
tomadera ki hala? Tomadera e kemana sindhanta
tomara ki anudhabana kara na
na ki tomadera kache suspasta kona dalila rayeche
tomara satyabadi hale tomadera kitaba ana.
Tara allaha o jbinadera madhye samparka sabyasta kareche, athaca jbinera jane ye, tara grephatara haye asabe.
Tara ya bale ta theke allaha pabitra.
Tabe yara allahara nisthabana banda, tara grephatara haye asabe na.
Ata'eba tomara ebam tomara yadera upasana kara
tadera ka'uke'i tomara allaha samparke bibhranta karate parabe na.
Sudhumatra tadera chara yara jahanname pauchabe.
Amadera pratyekera jan'ya rayeche nirdista sthana.
Ebam amara'i saribad'dhabhabe dandayamana thaki.
Ebam amara'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kari.
Tara to balatah
yadi amadera kache purbabartidera kona upadesa thakata
tabe amara abasya'i allahara manonita banda hatama.
Bastutah tara e'i kora'anake asbikara kareche. Ekhana sighra'i tara jene nite parabe
amara rasula o bandaganera byapare amara e'i bakya satya hayeche ye
abasya'i tara sahayya prapta haya.
Ara amara bahini'i haya bijayi.
Ata'eba apani kichukalera jan'ye taderake upeksa karuna.
Ebam taderake dekhate thakuna. Sighra'i tara'o era parinama dekhe nebe.
Amara ayaba ki tara druta kamana kare
atahpara yakhana tadera anginaya ayaba nayila habe, takhana yaderake satarka kara hayechila, tadera sakala belati habe khuba'i manda.
Apani kichukalera jan'ye taderake upeksa karuna.
Ebam dekhate thakuna, sighra'i tara'o era parinama dekhe nebe.
Pabitra apanara para'oyaradegarera satta, tini sam'manita o pabitra ya tara barnana kare ta theke.
Payagambaraganera prati salama barsita hoka.
Samasta prasansa bisbapalaka allahara nimitta.
Choyada. Sapatha upadesapurna kora'anera
baram yara kaphera, tara ahankara o birodhitaya lipta.
Tadera age ami kata janagosthike dhbansa karechi, atahpara tara artanada karate suru kareche kintu tadera niskrti labhera samaya chila na.
Tara bismayabodha kare ye, tadera'i kache tadera madhye theke ekajana satarkakari agamana karechena. Ara kapherara bale e-to eka mithyacari yadukara.
Se ki bahu upasyera paribarte eka upasyera upasana sabyasta kare diyeche. Niscaya eta eka bismayakara byapara.
Tadera katipaya bisista byakti ekatha bale prasthana kare ye, tomara cale ya'o ebam tomadera upasyadera pujaya drrha thaka. Niscaya'i e baktabya kona bisesa uddesye pranodita.
Amara sabeka dharme e dharanera katha sunini. Eta managara byapara bai naya.
Amadera madhya theke sudhu ki tara'i prati upadesa bani abatirna hala? Bastutah ora amara upadesa samparke sandihana; baram ora ekhana'o amara mara asbadana kareni.
Na ki tadera kache apanara parakranta dayabana palanakartara rahamatera kona bhandara rayeche
naki nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichura upara tadera samrajya rayeche? Thakale tadera akase arohana kara ucita rasi jhuliye.
Eksetre bahu bahinira madhye odera'o eka bahini ache, ya parajita habe.
Tadera purbe'o mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ada, kilaka bisista phera'una
samuda, lutera sampradaya o a'ikara lokera. Era'i chila bahu bahini.
Edera pratyeke'i payagambaraganera prati mithyaropa kareche. Phale amara ayaba pratisthita hayeche.
Kebala ekati mahanadera apeksa karache, yate dama phelara abakasa thakabe na.
Tara bale, he amadera para'oyaradegara, amadera prapya ansa hisaba dibasera age'i diye da'o.
Tara ya bale tate apani sabara karuna ebam amara saktisali banda da'udake smarana karuna. Se chila amara prati pratyabartanasila.
Ami parbatamalake tara anugami kare diyechilama, tara sakala-sandhyaya tara sathe pabitrata ghosana karata
ara paksikulake'o, yara tara kache samabeta hata. Saba'i chila tamra prati pratyabartanasila.
Ami tamra samrajyake sudrrha karechilama ebam tamke diyechilama prajna o phayasalakari bagnita.
